DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate performance , tolerability efficacy gas-exchange different CPAP ( Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ) system .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Different Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) Systems Patients With Acute Respiratory Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Three CPAP system study patient level PEEP : 1 ) continuous high-flow CPAP fix value PEEP valve ; 2 ) continuous high-flow CPAP Boussignac PEEP valve ; 3 ) demand flow CPAP , supply ventilator .
DOC.criteria: Intubatedtracheostomized subject receive CPAP wean invasive mechanical ventilation Hemodynamic instability Barotrauma Severe myopathy
